page.title: 15Shops.
page.content: I shop in the village store and the post office for things like bottles of drink, ice - lollies and sweets. Sometimes my mother goes to the Village Shop but she mostly shops at Safeways in Frome, Tesco's in Trowbridge or Sainsbury's in Bath. Most of my friends' mothers go to shops like Safeways or Tesco's. People normally shop more in big shops than little shops because the bigger shops are cheaper and there is more choice. The book shop is hardly used and you do not see any-one in it although the cane shop down the road is used quite a lot. The Cane Shop sells things like presents, pictures, baskets, wrapping paper, cards, bamboo chairs and bamboo mirrors. They also sell soaps, pencil sharpeners, ash trays and much more.
